Package xxl.applications.xml.relational.dom

Contains some examples that show the use of the xxl.core.xml.relational.dom classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ConvertermapExample This example shows the principles of type conversions in xxl.core.xml.relational.
CreateExample This is a sample usage for the xxl.xml.dom package.
HtmlExample This example reads the relation "actors" from the database specified in the "movie.prop"-file (see DatabaseAccess).
InsertExample This example reads the relation "web" from the database specified in the "std.prop"-file (see DatabaseAccess).
JoinExample This example constructs a two MetaDataCursors out of one XML-Document.
PerformanceTest This example constructs a MetaDataCursor out of an XML-Document and then tests the performance (time for a walk through).
ReadExample This example constructs a MetaDataCursor out of an XML-Document and then outputs the meta data and the data.
 

Package xxl.applications.xml.relational.dom Description

Contains some examples that show the use of the xxl.core.xml.relational.dom classes.

All XML examples read their sourcefiles from "xxlrootpath/data/xml" and write results to "xxloutpath/applications/xml". So, the environment variables have to be passed to the application with the -D option. This is done automatically within the script "xxl". So call the examples using 

                        xxl xxl.applications.xml.relational.dom.[name]
